rules_text:
When Blood Sluice enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian artifact creature token with lifelink.
Grand evolution 4–{4} [i]({4}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put four +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
